programme.desc: Frankie flips the script for his wife Heather making breakfast for dinner featuring Banana Maple Pancakes, Eggs Benedict with prosciutto cotto, Home Fries with Bloody Mary Ketchup, Sausage Scrapple, and a boozy Espresso Milkshake.

programme.title: Spooky Season
programme.desc: The fog is rolling in, which means its time for the spooky season! But dont you worry, because youll be able to keep those ghosts and skeletons happy with all the spooky eats and scary treats in this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Pizza
programme.desc: Frankie makes pizza magic with two incredible doughs, turning his kitchen into a pizza party with grilled sausage pizza, cheesy Grandma Pies, golden Panzerotti, and a sweet dessert pizza topped with ricotta, berries, and honey.

programme.title: Italian Smokehouse
programme.desc: Frankie fires up a steakhouse-style spread with Italian flair from golden beets and buttery mushrooms to a sizzling Bistecca alla Fiorentina steak with salmoriglio sauce, and a smooth cold brew affogato granita.

programme.title: Lunch That Goes the Distance
programme.desc: Frankie fuels up for action making hot Oatmeal, and Energy Date Balls, before he cooks up the perfect post-ride feast of cheesy Juicy Lucy Burgers, Ramp-loaded pasta salad, and a maple ginger switchel to cool it all down.

programme.title: Pasta From Scratch
programme.desc: Frankie explores his Italian roots, pairing each pasta shape with its perfect saucefrom Cavatelli with Super Green Sauce to Pappardelle in pork ragout, ricotta Gnocchi with punchy anchovy pecorino, and cozy Squash Orzotto with bloomed poppy seeds.

programme.title: MasterChef India
programme.desc: MasterChef is a reality show that features amateur chefs and home cooks as contestants who battle for the MasterChef title. Stay tuned to find out who will be the winner of the title.

programme.title: The Magician

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E066
programme.desc: Fernanda, Nicols y en especial Antonieta no pueden creer que sea cierto que Jons no se va a presentar en el matrimonio como asegura Felipe; la seora le prohbe a su hija que se ponga a llorar y les ordena a su sobrino y a Felipe que vayan en busca del novio y lo traigan aunque sea a empujones. La furia de Adelaida contra Hilario aumenta cuando el hombre sugiere que ella quiere irse a la ciudad para escuchar las palabras de amor de Hansen; la mujer exige a su esposo la respete. En la habitacion de Nicols en la mansion Alcoy, el y Victoria se dejan arrastrar por el amor que los une y se entregan a la pasion.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E067 - Episodio 67
programme.desc: Al ver a Hilario enfermo, Florencia confiesa que, por primera vez, no lo ve con el mismo odio que suele tenerle. Nicols y Victoria se despiden con un dulce beso y la esperanza de que la proxima vez que se vean ninguno tenga nada que temer, antes de irse de la mansion Alcoy, Victoria finge ante el mayordomo que se le quedo algo y regresa a la habitacion de su amado, donde consigue un video con su nombre. La impresion crece en Victoria cuando Nicols deja entrar a unos policas que pretenden detenerla y Nicols la seala como la asesina de Leopoldo Alcoy. Hilario asegura a Florencia que, cuando se recupere, se va a merecer el beso que acaba de darle y ese no va a ser el nico que le va a querer dar. Fernanda se siente triunfal y Nicols decepcionado cuando acuden al llamado de Victoria y esta se confiesa culpable de la muerte de Leopoldo, aunque no admite haberle disparado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E75
programme.desc: Roger, lleva a Camila a un edificio en construccion, solitario, bajo coaccion la hace hablar con Ezequiel, quien amenaza a Roger con matarlo si llega a daar a Camila. Roger expresa todo el odio como fue que asesino a su hermano Marcos. Max y Torrealba llegan y encuentran a Roger descontrolado, con Camila de rehen.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E76
programme.desc: Camila se le acerca tratando de calmarlo y el comando aprovecha para someter al joven. Camila corre a refugiarse en los brazos de Max. Luego, informan a Ezequiel que Camila ya est a salvo. Cuando el inspector la interroga, ella, siguiendo instrucciones, no presenta cargos y esto enfurece a Max, pero es parte de su plan conciliador.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E96
programme.desc: With the feeling that something strange is going on with Illis, Clara Ines visits her mother in her room; the impostor tries to manipulate Clara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E97
programme.desc: Pastora boasts to Elisenda about having sent Cirilo to prison and humiliating Clara at the police station.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E96
programme.desc: Alberto interrupts a conversation between Gertrudis and Mara Lourdes to ask the Prosecutor to spare no effort to put Claudio and Lorena in jail. Gertrudis recommends Lourdes to follow her instructions to win the trial, who accepts with resignation. Then, behind her sons back, she gives Lourdes another check as payment for her services and complicity.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E72
programme.desc: Cesar insiste en saber si Carlos Ral y Adriana se entienden a sus espaldas, pero el medico evade responderle.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E73
programme.desc: Adriana no est dispuesta a permitir que Cesar y Carlos Ral se sigan peleando por ella; por lo que decide aclarar de una vez su situacion con Cesar.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E74
programme.desc: Adriana sigue discutiendo con Azalea y Ninoska porque quiere llevarse a Tatianita; Cesar, que llega con Carlos Ral, intenta mediar, pero est decidida a llevarse a la nia.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E067 - Episodio 67
programme.desc: Al ver a Hilario enfermo, Florencia confiesa que, por primera vez, no lo ve con el mismo odio que suele tenerle. Nicols y Victoria se despiden con un dulce beso y la esperanza de que la proxima vez que se vean ninguno tenga nada que temer, antes de irse de la mansion Alcoy, Victoria finge ante el mayordomo que se le quedo algo y regresa a la habitacion de su amado, donde consigue un video con su nombre. La impresion crece en Victoria cuando Nicols deja entrar a unos policas que pretenden detenerla y Nicols la seala como la asesina de Leopoldo Alcoy. Hilario asegura a Florencia que, cuando se recupere, se va a merecer el beso que acaba de darle y ese no va a ser el nico que le va a querer dar. Fernanda se siente triunfal y Nicols decepcionado cuando acuden al llamado de Victoria y esta se confiesa culpable de la muerte de Leopoldo, aunque no admite haberle disparado.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E068
programme.desc: Nicols acusa a Victoria de ser igual que Hilario Guanipa; la joven, herida, asegura a Del Casal que, cuando salga en libertad, le va a demostrar que tiene razon en decirle que es igual a su padre; pues fue Hilario quien le enseo a los Del Casal que no valen nada y ella har lo mismo. Nicols promete a Florencia amarla como ella desea y no permitir que Hilario la aparte de el, promesa que sella con un dulce beso que la joven acepta enamorada. Victoria exige a Hansen le explique como es que Cantarrana ya no es de su familia; la muchacha enfurece cuando el empresario aclara que el traspaso se realizo a traves de Fernanda; en ese momento llega Nicols. Felipe se muestra solidario con Antonieta, la que le sugiere que no le cuente a Clementina que la est visitando porque la muchacha no lo va a entender.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E76
programme.desc: Camila se le acerca tratando de calmarlo y el comando aprovecha para someter al joven. Camila corre a refugiarse en los brazos de Max. Luego, informan a Ezequiel que Camila ya est a salvo. Cuando el inspector la interroga, ella, siguiendo instrucciones, no presenta cargos y esto enfurece a Max, pero es parte de su plan conciliador.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E77
programme.desc: Amelia y Fausto, en el da de la boda. Llega Camila, deslumbrante, provocando la admiracion de unos y el desprecio de otros. Ella se sincera con el Padre Tiziano sobre lo que viene a cumplir para el cura es tremendamente fuerte, pues no conoce en ella la nia que ayudo a criar. Ezequiel aviva el odio y da instrucciones que deben seguirse.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E97
programme.desc: Pastora boasts to Elisenda about having sent Cirilo to prison and humiliating Clara at the police station.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E98
programme.desc: In the midst of the wine, a mysterious waiter takes a bottle out of his bag and places it next to the glasses with which the godparents will toast.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E97
programme.desc: Gertrudis talks to Michelle, her drug dealer friend, asking for help to get Claudio out of jail - With the consent of the Chief of Police, Virginia meets Claudio at the police station. She confronts him and demands to know details of the bipolar disorder that she surely inherited from him, since she already knows that she is his daughter.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E98
programme.desc: Michelle agrees to help Gertrudis organize Claudios escape; she plans to perform surgery to change his face so that she can live with him without legal problems. She confesses that she loves Claudio and is willing to pay whatever it takes to get him out of jail. They make a pact. Omar tells Patricia that he did everything he could to delay Lorenas transfer, but it was impossible.

programme.desc: Adriana acusa gran sorpresa cuando Cesar le lleva a Tatianita para que viva con ella, pues es a su lado que quiere que la nia crezca.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E068
programme.desc: Nicols acusa a Victoria de ser igual que Hilario Guanipa; la joven, herida, asegura a Del Casal que, cuando salga en libertad, le va a demostrar que tiene razon en decirle que es igual a su padre; pues fue Hilario quien le enseo a los Del Casal que no valen nada y ella har lo mismo. Nicols promete a Florencia amarla como ella desea y no permitir que Hilario la aparte de el, promesa que sella con un dulce beso que la joven acepta enamorada. Victoria exige a Hansen le explique como es que Cantarrana ya no es de su familia; la muchacha enfurece cuando el empresario aclara que el traspaso se realizo a traves de Fernanda; en ese momento llega Nicols. Felipe se muestra solidario con Antonieta, la que le sugiere que no le cuente a Clementina que la est visitando porque la muchacha no lo va a entender.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E069
programme.desc: Al enterarse de que Victoria est libre gracias a que Hilario le entrego Cantarrana a Fernanda; Nicols asegura a la muchacha que el no hubiera aceptado ese trato porque quiere que se imponga la verdad; la joven Guanipa, indignada, lo acusa de ser un traidor que no es capaz de asumir quien es en realidad. La sorpresa se apodera de Caravaggio cuando Fernanda le pide la ayude a conseguir que Felipe Osuna se case con Antonieta, pues ese es el hombre que su hija quiere en realidad. Hilario discute con Nicols exigiendole que se marche cuando llega Victoria y le recuerda a su padre que ya le haba advertido que la perdera si se volva acercar a Florencia.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E77
programme.desc: Amelia y Fausto, en el da de la boda. Llega Camila, deslumbrante, provocando la admiracion de unos y el desprecio de otros. Ella se sincera con el Padre Tiziano sobre lo que viene a cumplir para el cura es tremendamente fuerte, pues no conoce en ella la nia que ayudo a criar. Ezequiel aviva el odio y da instrucciones que deben seguirse.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E78
programme.desc: Ante la insistencia de Ezequiel, la respuesta de Camila es que no lo ama y su trato solo es por conveniencia. Max mantiene su cercana a Camila rogndole que vuelva. La carta de Gregorio conmueve a Julia y accede a reunirse con el. Al llegar al hotel encuentran a Astrid y Fernando demostrando su relacion.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E98
programme.desc: In the midst of the wine, a mysterious waiter takes a bottle out of his bag and places it next to the glasses with which the godparents will toast.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E99
programme.desc: Pastora tells Israel how she hid Illis while she was pregnant and managed to disappear Clara.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E98
programme.desc: Michelle agrees to help Gertrudis organize Claudios escape; she plans to perform surgery to change his face so that she can live with him without legal problems. She confesses that she loves Claudio and is willing to pay whatever it takes to get him out of jail. They make a pact. Omar tells Patricia that he did everything he could to delay Lorenas transfer, but it was impossible.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E99
programme.desc: Malena seeks to find out if Isabel was the one who snitched on her to the police - Mara Balbina insists to Ricardo about the wedding; and he, surprised, almost reveals himself as he implies that she is not the only one who wants to marry him - Mara Lourdes calls Gertrudis as a witness in court; and although Patricia opposes, Judge Echeverri accepts her as the first to testify against Lorena.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E74
programme.desc: Adriana sigue discutiendo con Azalea y Ninoska porque quiere llevarse a Tatianita; Cesar, que llega con Carlos Ral, intenta mediar, pero est decidida a llevarse a la nia.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E06 - Crushed by a Boulder Part 2
programme.desc: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he wont be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E07 - Iraqi Sniper Attack
programme.desc: On deployment in Anbar Province, Marine Corp Master Sergeant Buck Doyle throws himself in harms way to save a fallen comrade from an Iraqi sniper and becomes a target himself.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E08 - Lightning Strike
programme.desc: A bass fishing trip goes horribly wrong when a bolt of lightning strikes their boat, leaving Seventeen-year-old Christian Neal burned and unconscious and his father Gabe blown into the water and paralyzed. It will take a miracle to save them.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E09 - Mountain Lion Attack
programme.desc: Marine Anne Hjelle was mountain biking when she was ripped off her bike by a mountain lion. Anne fought back even as the big cat shredded her face in its jaws. Surviving the attack was only the beginning of Annes incredible fight to survive.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S01:E03 - Jamey Mosch
programme.desc: Were following hunter Jamey Mosch into the Florida everglades as his hunting trips turns into a four day nightmare.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E04 - Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack
programme.desc: Laura and Nick break down the behaviors, strength, eyesight and speed of mountain lions through experiments and explore techniques to deal with these apex predators.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E05 - Surviving a Lightning Strike
programme.desc: Laura and Nick determine the power lightning has and how it behaves at a state-of-the-art Direct Effects Lightning Test Lab. They provide advice for hunters and fishermen to protect themselves from it.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E06 - ATV Accidents
programme.desc: Laura and Nick rig up some dramatic, high-speed tests of ATVs to see how accidents happen and what to do to protect from harm.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E07 - Treestand Accidents
programme.desc: Exploring why treestand accidents happen and how to prevent them.

programme.title: Survival Science - S01:E08 - Surviving Natures Fury
programme.desc: Nick Mundt and Laura Schara experience Natures fury through storm amazing generating gear that simulates terrible hurricanes, ice cold winds and even tornados. For these experiments theyll use remarkable technology that creates massive storms on Hollywood sets.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E24 - The Queen Her True Story
programme.desc: The story of an extraordinary woman and her incredible life.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E09 - Weary Travellers
programme.desc: R.L. and Casey travel far from their camp to reach the heart of moose country as the rut begins. Meanwhile, Chris looks into finding a new way out because of the rough weather.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E10 - Lifted
programme.desc: As their Alaskan adventure wraps up, Kaid and R.L. think about what really counts in life and what theyve discovered about living. Lifelong bonds are stronger than ever as they get ready to leave Alaska.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E04 - Operation Snow Cat
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens ride snowmobiles through the mountains in winter. Its elk hunting season, so they also make sure everyone is following the hunting rules.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E03 - Married to the Job
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E06 - Golden Glaciers and Danger
programme.desc: Tom and Kael Massie decide to enter a natural glacier cave, leading to a string of mishaps and terrifying collapse of the glaciers mouth, but they emerge unscathed and with a prize.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E07 - Hunt for General Lee
programme.desc: Manny returns to Floridas Dead River in search of a massive 14 foot alligator.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E08 - Mannys Confession
programme.desc: Manny relives a vicious alligator attack.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E06 - The Zambezi River Mystery
programme.desc: Carters W.A.R. (Wild Animal Response) is the untold story of one mans quest to save his homeland, the worlds most wild and dangerous continent on earth, Africa. From heavily armed poachers butchering elephants for their tusks to the slaughter of rhinos for their horns, Africas most precious resource is in peril. Can one man expose the truth and make a difference? Watch as wildlife detective and professional hunter, Ivan Carter, takes you inside the real Africa to the front lines of the wars being waged on its wildlife.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E06 - Princess Dianas Legacy
programme.desc: Reflecting on Dianas legacy, this show delves into what Princess Diana left behind after her sudden passing - the impression she left on her children, the royal family, and the people who loved her. The young princes drew admiration with their demeanor at her funeral, but many questioned how their bond with Prince Charles would be moving forward.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E07 - William And Kate Into The Future
programme.desc: From a regular student to a royal girlfriend, Kate Middleton has transformed into a real-life princess. In less than ten years, this everyday girl with a normal background captured her princes heart and is now on track to become the future Queen of England.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E01 - Empty Handed
programme.desc: In remote areas, survival is an everyday game. Enter hosts Chris and Casey Keefer as they set out to survive 30 days in the backcountry. Each new day these brothers will pit their skills as hunters, woodsmen, and fishermen against an unforgiving and relentless landscape. DROPPED brings viewers face to face with the harsh reality of only being able to eat what you can kill. A true test of survival. The Keefer brothers put boots to ground as their journey through Alaska begins. Armed with nothing but a couple Glock 20s, the brothers immediately begin their search for their first supply-yielding catch.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E02 - Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of their second cache.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E05 - Operation Litter Bug
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E04 - Juggled Lives
programme.desc: Dr. AJ Wheelers hectic schedule keeps him out of action, but his team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur. Then another call comes in and Dr. Wheeler is there, trying to rescue a man who tumbles off a 200 foot cliff.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E07 - Legends of Buried Treasure
programme.desc: Stanton Arizona is famous for its gold mining history, including the legend of Charles Stantons buried treasure, and Tom has a hunch!

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E09 - How Not to Get Eaten
programme.desc: After a near-fatal attack in north Florida, Manny decides to educate the viewer And the local alligators.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E10 - Hog Tussle
programme.desc: Manny Puig hunts wild hogs in the palmetto forests of northern Florida and is attacked by a 200 pound boar.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E07 - Death for Profit
programme.desc: Ivan Carter joins the heroes saving rhinos in Africas Kruger National Park

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E08 - Princess Diana The Uncrowned Queen
programme.desc: This show offers a captivating look into the extraordinary life of one of the 20th centurys most fascinating women, seen through an American lens. It features clips from the auction where her dresses were sold.

programme.desc: Dr. AJ Wheelers hectic schedule keeps him out of action, but his team battles high winds in the heli to save a snowmobiler with a busted femur. Then another call comes in and Dr. Wheeler is there, trying to rescue a man who tumbles off a 200 foot cliff.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E07 - Legends of Buried Treasure
programme.desc: Stanton Arizona is famous for its gold mining history, including the legend of Charles Stantons buried treasure, and Tom has a hunch!

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E09 - How Not to Get Eaten
programme.desc: After a near-fatal attack in north Florida, Manny decides to educate the viewer And the local alligators.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S03:E10 - Hog Tussle
programme.desc: Manny Puig hunts wild hogs in the palmetto forests of northern Florida and is attacked by a 200 pound boar.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E07 - Death for Profit
programme.desc: Ivan Carter joins the heroes saving rhinos in Africas Kruger National Park

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E08 - Princess Diana The Uncrowned Queen
programme.desc: This show offers a captivating look into the extraordinary life of one of the 20th centurys most fascinating women, seen through an American lens. It features clips from the auction where her dresses were sold.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E07 - William And Kate Into The Future
programme.desc: From a regular student to a royal girlfriend, Kate Middleton has transformed into a real-life princess. In less than ten years, this everyday girl with a normal background captured her princes heart and is now on track to become the future Queen of England.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E01 - Empty Handed
programme.desc: In remote areas, survival is an everyday game. Enter hosts Chris and Casey Keefer as they set out to survive 30 days in the backcountry. Each new day these brothers will pit their skills as hunters, woodsmen, and fishermen against an unforgiving and relentless landscape. DROPPED brings viewers face to face with the harsh reality of only being able to eat what you can kill. A true test of survival. The Keefer brothers put boots to ground as their journey through Alaska begins. Armed with nothing but a couple Glock 20s, the brothers immediately begin their search for their first supply-yielding catch.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E02 - Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of their second cache.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E05 - Operation Litter Bug
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, where she soon finds herself mentoring a handsome BAndB owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: Catfish Murder
programme.desc: Doing her best to balance a successful career with family life, a single moms world spirals out of control when her shy teenage son is arrested for the murder of a young woman from the same high school.

programme.title: Danger Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Nicolette, a high school senior has bounced around from foster home to home. She started feeling hopeless when found herself pregnant by the school quarterback.

programme.desc: When Stephanie inherits a watch, she learns that it allows her to travel back in time five minutes, once a day. But as she uses it more and more, her life, and romance with her coworker Hunter, doesnt shake out the way she hoped.

programme.title: Stolen in her Sleep
programme.desc: New mom Hallie Reynolds is devoted to baby AVA, who had a heart transplant when she was born; but motherhood is exhausting and her mother-in-law is overbearing, so Hallie is thrilled when she makes a new friend in Megan Banks. Hallies life takes a sinister turn as danger seems to follow her every move, and she starts to question whether someone is out to kill her and take her child or if its just her mind playing tricks.
